an6.53:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an6.53:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.53:2.1: “Atthi nu kho, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko”ti?
an6.53:2.2: “Atthi kho, brahmana, eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko”ti.
an6.53:3.1: “Katamo pana, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko”ti?
an6.53:3.2: “Appamado kho, brahmana, eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko.
an6.53:4.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, yani kanici jangalanam pananam padajatani, sabbani tani hatthipade samodhanam gacchanti; hatthipadam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam mahantattena.
an6.53:4.2: Evamevam kho, brahmana, appamado eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko.
an6.53:5.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, kutagarassa ya kaci gopanasiyo sabba ta kutangama kutaninna kutasamosarana, kutam tasam aggamakkhayati;
an6.53:6.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, pabbajalayako pabbajam layitva agge gahetva odhunati nidhunati nicchadeti;
an6.53:7.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, ambapindiya vantacchinnaya yani kanici ambani vantupanibandhanani sabbani tani tadanvayani bhavanti;
an6.53:8.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, ye keci khuddarajano sabbete ranno cakkavattissa anuyanta bhavanti, raja tesam cakkavatti aggamakkhayati;
an6.53:9.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, ya kaci tarakarupanam pabha sabba ta candassa pabhaya kalam nagghanti solasim, candappabha tasam aggamakkhayati;
an6.53:9.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, appamado eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham yo ca attho samparayiko.
an6.53:10.1: Ayam kho, brahmana, eko dhammo bhavito bahulikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha titthati—ditthadhammikanceva attham, yo ca attho samparayiko”ti.
an6.53:11.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
